title: SESSION RESULT detail page Â» LAP TIMES
user_story:
As a visitor\
I want to see all LAP TIMES that were achieved in the scope of the SESSION RESULT\
So I can compare them
description:
* The SESSION RESULT detail page contains a section with a list of all connected LAP TIMES.
* Each LAP TIME in the list is presented with its name and primary information.
* Each LAP TIME in the list contains a link to its detail page.
* Each LAP TIME in the list has a thumbnail image.
* When there is no LAP TIME connected to the SESSION RESULT then the section is not displayed at all.
